thread.title: WATCH || John Wall goes through-the-legs for amazing assist
thread.title_full: WATCH || John Wall goes through-the-legs for amazing assist

title: WATCH || John Wall goes through-the-legs for amazing assist
text:
Manage WATCH || John Wall goes through-the-legs for amazing assist John Wall goes through his legs for an amazing assist to Otto Porter vs. the Oklahoma City Thunder. 
Former Wildcat and Washington Wizards all-star point guard John Wall leads the Eastern Conference and is second in the NBA in assists this season. 
I guess normal bounce or chest passes simply aren't going to cut it anymore. 
Midway through the third quarter of the Wizards' 120-98 win over the Oklahoma City Thunder Monday night, Wall went through his legs to Otto Porter for the one-handed slam. 
On the season, Wall is averaging career-bests in both points (22.9) and assists (10.6) in leading Washington to a 33-21 record and the No. 3-seed in the East headed into the all-star break. 
Wall will participate in both the NBA All-Star Game and the Taco Bell Skills Challenge at All-Star Weekend in New Orleans. Author
